Chapter.Label: The Small Algebra Package
Chapter.Heading: Small StrongDoppelsemigroup Package
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small StrongDoppelsemigroup AllSmallStrongDoppelsemigroup is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic strongdoppelsemigroup models from orders 2 to 5.
The models are generated by Mace4 , using the definitions in Section .

Definition of StrongDoppelsemigroup formulas(StrongDoppelsemigroup).
(x + y) * z = x + (y * z).
(x * y) + z = x * (y + z).
(x + y) + z = x + (y + z).
(x * y) * z = x * (y * z).
x + (y * z) = x * (y + z).
end_of_list.
Dependency This package has dependencies on the Magmaut package.
